snippet: Valentino Rossi, a nine-time world champion, won the San Marino Grand Prix at his home track after Marc Márquez, the MotoGP world championship leader, fell and finished 15th.
abstract: Nine-time world champion Valentino Rossi wins the San Marino Grand Prix motorcycle race.
lead_paragraph: Valentino Rossi, a nine-time world champion, won the San Marino Grand Prix at his home track after Marc Márquez, the MotoGP world championship leader, fell and finished 15th.

headline.main: Rossi Prevails in San Marino Grand Prix
headline.print_headline: Rossi Prevails in San Marino Grand Prix
